item.title: Monoids
item.description: A monoid is a simple concept. It is a generalization of some patterns that you very likely already have seen. Being aware of those can help in designing some operations and can simplify things. Without much further ado let us look at three simple math equations. 1 + 2 = 3 (1 + 2) + 3 = 1 + (2 + 3) 1 + 0 = 0 + 1 Table of Content Binary Operations Associativity Identity Monoids Subtraction Multiplication Division What is the purpose of all of this?
